title: Wagtail
description:
Wagtail is a leading open-source CMS, trusted by tens of thousands of organisations worldwide, including Google, NASA, Oxfam, Caltech and the NHS. Powered by Python, Wagtail is scalable, extensible and secure, and features best-in-class content management tools, configurable workflows, translation and localisation capabilities, powerful search and more. Wagtail is an excellent choice for organisations that care about sustainability and accessibility.

wagtail.org/about-wagtail
